trans-unit.source: Resources for batch and HPC workloads in the cloud | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Resources for batch and HPC workloads in the cloud | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Lists technical resources to help you run your large-scale parallel, batch, and high performance computing (HPC) workloads in Azure.
trans-unit.target: Lists technical resources to help you run your large-scale parallel, batch, and high performance computing (HPC) workloads in Azure.

trans-unit.source: Big Compute in Azure: Technical resources for batch and high performance computing (HPC)
trans-unit.target: Big Compute in Azure: Technical resources for batch and high performance computing (HPC)

trans-unit.source: This is a guide to technical resources to help you run your large-scale parallel, batch, and HPC workloads in Azure.
trans-unit.target: This is a guide to technical resources to help you run your large-scale parallel, batch, and HPC workloads in Azure.

trans-unit.source: Extend your existing batch or HPC workloads to the Azure cloud, or build new Big Compute solutions in Azure using a range of Azure services.
trans-unit.target: Extend your existing batch or HPC workloads to the Azure cloud, or build new Big Compute solutions in Azure using a range of Azure services.

trans-unit.source: Learn about Big Compute options in Azure, and choose the right approach for your workload and business need.
trans-unit.target: Learn about Big Compute options in Azure, and choose the right approach for your workload and business need.

trans-unit.source: Video: Big Compute in the cloud with Azure and HPC
trans-unit.target: Video: Big Compute in the cloud with Azure and HPC

trans-unit.source: [Batch](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/batch/) is a platform service that makes it easy to cloud-enable your applications and run jobs without setting up and managing a cluster and job scheduler.
trans-unit.target: [Batch](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/batch/) is a platform service that makes it easy to cloud-enable your applications and run jobs without setting up and managing a cluster and job scheduler.

trans-unit.source: Use the SDK to integrate client applications with Azure Batch through a variety of languages, stage data to Azure, and build job execution pipelines.
trans-unit.target: Use the SDK to integrate client applications with Azure Batch through a variety of languages, stage data to Azure, and build job execution pipelines.

trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Getting started with Azure Batch library for .NET
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Getting started with Azure Batch library for .NET

trans-unit.source: Deploy or extend your existing Windows or Linux HPC cluster to Azure to run your compute intensive workloads.
trans-unit.target: Deploy or extend your existing Windows or Linux HPC cluster to Azure to run your compute intensive workloads.

trans-unit.source: HPC Pack is Microsoft's free HPC solution built on Microsoft Azure and Windows Server technologies, capable of running Windows and Linux HPC workloads.
trans-unit.target: HPC Pack is Microsoft's free HPC solution built on Microsoft Azure and Windows Server technologies, capable of running Windows and Linux HPC workloads.

trans-unit.source: HPC cluster options with Microsoft HPC Pack in Azure
trans-unit.target: HPC cluster options with Microsoft HPC Pack in Azure

trans-unit.source: Burst to Azure worker instances with HPC Pack
trans-unit.target: Burst to Azure worker instances with HPC Pack

trans-unit.source: Burst to Azure Batch with HPC Pack
trans-unit.target: Burst to Azure Batch with HPC Pack

trans-unit.source: Use these Azure templates to deploy Linux HPC clusters.
trans-unit.target: Use these Azure templates to deploy Linux HPC clusters.

trans-unit.source: Intel Cloud Edition for Lustre Software - Eval
trans-unit.target: Intel Cloud Edition for Lustre Software - Eval

trans-unit.source: [Microsoft MPI](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb524831.aspx) (MS-MPI) is a Microsoft implementation of the Message Passing Interface standard for developing and running parallel applications on the Windows platform.
trans-unit.target: [Microsoft MPI](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb524831.aspx) (MS-MPI) is a Microsoft implementation of the Message Passing Interface standard for developing and running parallel applications on the Windows platform.

trans-unit.source: Azure offers a [range of sizes](../virtual-machines/virtual-machines-windows-sizes.md), including compute intensive [A8 and A9](../virtual-machines/virtual-machines-windows-a8-a9-a10-a11-specs.md) instances capable of connecting to a back-end RDMA network, to run your Linux and Windows HPC workloads.
trans-unit.target: Azure offers a [range of sizes](../virtual-machines/virtual-machines-windows-sizes.md), including compute intensive [A8 and A9](../virtual-machines/virtual-machines-windows-a8-a9-a10-a11-specs.md) instances capable of connecting to a back-end RDMA network, to run your Linux and Windows HPC workloads.

trans-unit.source: Set up a Linux RDMA cluster to run MPI applications
trans-unit.target: Set up a Linux RDMA cluster to run MPI applications

trans-unit.source: Set up a Windows RDMA cluster with Microsoft HPC Pack to run MPI applications
trans-unit.target: Set up a Windows RDMA cluster with Microsoft HPC Pack to run MPI applications

trans-unit.source: [HPC and data orchestration using Azure Batch and Azure Data Factory](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=717686) (PDF) and [article](../data-factory/data-factory-data-processing-using-batch.md)
trans-unit.target: [HPC and data orchestration using Azure Batch and Azure Data Factory](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=717686) (PDF) and [article](../data-factory/data-factory-data-processing-using-batch.md)

trans-unit.source: For the latest announcements, see the [Microsoft HPC and Batch team blog](http://blogs.technet.com/b/windowshpc/) and the [Azure blog](https://azure.microsoft.com/blog/tag/hpc/).
trans-unit.target: For the latest announcements, see the [Microsoft HPC and Batch team blog](http://blogs.technet.com/b/windowshpc/) and the [Azure blog](https://azure.microsoft.com/blog/tag/hpc/).

trans-unit.source: Also see [what's new in Batch](https://azure.microsoft.com/updates/?service=batch) or subscribe to the [RSS feed](https://azure.microsoft.com/updates/feed/?service=batch).
trans-unit.target: Also see [what's new in Batch](https://azure.microsoft.com/updates/?service=batch) or subscribe to the [RSS feed](https://azure.microsoft.com/updates/feed/?service=batch).
